description.value:
Divine power is always at your fingertips, swiftly responding to your call.

When you cast @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.spells-srd.Harm]{Harm} or @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.spells-srd.Heal]{Heal} by spending 2 actions, you can get the effects of the 3-action version instead of the 2-action version. You can do this with harm if you have harmful font or heal if you have healing font (or both if you have Versatile Font).
